name: InputDecorator
desc: Defines the appearance of a Material Design text field.

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: The text and styles to use when decorating the child.

fields.name: baseStyle
fields.desc: The style on which to base the label, hint, counter, and error styles if the [decoration] does not provide explicit styles.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How the text in the decoration should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: textAlignVertical
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.InputDecorator.textAlignVertical} How the text should be aligned vertically.

fields.name: isFocused
fields.desc: Whether the input field has focus.

fields.name: isHovering
fields.desc: Whether the input field is being hovered over by a mouse pointer.

fields.name: expands
fields.desc: If true, the height of the input field will be as large as possible.

fields.name: isEmpty
fields.desc: Whether the input field is empty.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
